text:
.@AOC opportunistically exploits #Covid19 in a bid to make Communism the #NewNormal:
“Only in America when the @POTUS tweets about liberation does he mean ‘go back to work’...I think a lot of people should just say No-we’re not going back’”😳
#Trump2020
https://t.co/7fxp6KdZMK
